channel.title: Comments on: SQL Advent 2011 Day 18: Table-valued Parameters

item.title: By: Murali
item.dc:creator: Murali
item.description: This is a great post. What permissions do I need to have on the database to be able to create table valued parameters?
item.content:encoded: This is a great post. What permissions do I need to have on the database to be able to create table valued parameters?
